attributes.action: set up a broadly based Royal Commission into the current state of the scientific  evidence world-wide for the existence of global warming.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The evidence for so-called global warming is to say the least contradictory and many thousands of scientists from many relevant disciplines all over the world reject the thesis. Yet we are committing ourselves world-wide to the most astonishing financial burdens to battle a possibly non-existent problem. Many people are now sceptical of the work of the IPCC.
